title: Largest cities in Finland 2018
summary: In 2018 , Helsinki had the Largest inhabitants of all City 2018 .
This according to data provided by City .
The Iranian-Dutch fashion blogger fits in a larger trend : City either have a background in music ( such as rappers Lil ' Tampere and Turku ) , or they were involved in beauty or fashion .
gold: This statistic shows the ten largest cities in Finland as of December 2018 . The largest city in Finland is Helsinki with roughly 648 thousand citizens . Helsinki is the capital of Finland and is located in the south .
